branchCategory.name: EX600 Accessories
branchCategory.description: <p>The EX600 serial interface offers a full suite of diagnostics and programmable parameters to meet the most stringent requirements. The EX600 offers excellent flexibility including digital input, digital output and analog input unit options. With the use of D-sub output blocks, a maximum of 9 remote D-sub manifolds can be attached to one EX600 communication module. This serial interface is compatible with series SV1000/2000/3000, VQC1000/2000/4000, S0700 and the new SY series valves. Available protocols include PROFIBUS-DP<span style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 10pt;">®</span>, DeviceNet<span style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 10pt;">&trade;</span>, CC-Link, Ethernet I/P<span style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 10pt;">&trade;</span> and EtherCAT<span style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 10pt;">®, PROFINET, POWELINK and CC-Link IE Field</span><span style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 13.3333px;">&trade;</span></p>

branchItem.name: EX600, End Plate Bracket
branchItem.description: DIN Rail mounting bracket for the EX600 End Plate.

branchItem.name: EX600, Valve Plate Bracket
branchItem.description: Valve plate bracket for connecting the EX600 SI Unit to the valve manifold

branchItem.name: EX600, Field-Wireable Communication Cable Connector (CC-Link, DeviceNet™, PROFIBUS DP)
branchItem.description: Field-wireable connector for connecting the EX600 SI Unit to the fieldbus. Connector options include support for communication protocols CC-Link, DeviceNet™ , and PROFIBUS DP.

branchItem.name: EX600, Power Supply Cable, M12 Connector (5-pin B-coded)
branchItem.description: The power supply cable with M12 connector is used to connect the EX600-ED2 End Plate to a power supply. Available with straight and right angle connectors in lengths of 2m and 6m.

branchItem.name: Communication Cable for Ethernet Fieldbus
branchItem.description: <p>The EX600 serial interface offers a full suite of diagnostics and programmable parameters to meet the most stringent requirements. The EX600 offers excellent flexibility including digital input, digital output and analog input unit options. With the use of D-sub output blocks, a maximum of 9 remote D-sub manifolds can be attached to one EX600 communication module. This serial interface is compatible with series SV1000/2000/3000, VQC1000/2000/4000, S0700 and the new SY series valves. Available protocols include PROFIBUS-DP<span style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 10pt;">®</span>, DeviceNet<span style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 10pt;">&trade;</span>, CC-Link, Ethernet I/P<span style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 10pt;">&trade;</span> and EtherCAT<span style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 10pt;">®, PROFINET, POWELINK and CC-Link IE Field</span><span style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 13.3333px;">&trade;</span></p>

branchItem.name: Communication Cable for CC-Link, DeviceNet™, PROFIBUS DP Fieldbus
branchItem.description: Communication cable with connector for connecting the EX600 SI Unit to the fieldbus. Connector options include support for communication protocols CC-Link, DeviceNet™ , and PROFIBUS DP.

branchItem.name: EX9-PE1-X15/22/23/24, Power Block
branchItem.description: <p>EX9-PE1 power block allows different areas on the same manifold to be controlled by separate power supplies.  Power can be supplied individually to 8 zones using up to 4 power blocks</p>
